key_risks: Regulatory and compliance issues, including SEC charges for recordkeeping failures and statutory disqualification under FINRA rules
Legal disputes with former employees and ongoing litigation over fiduciary duties and partnership agreements
Market volatility and economic cycle sensitivity, particularly in M&A and capital markets activity
Intense competition from independent advisory firms and large banks
controversies: Insider trading probe involving an employee in Germany
High-profile litigation with ex-partners accused of client poaching
social_issues: Cultural challenges and employee dissatisfaction, as indicated by reviews on platforms like Indeed
governance_issues: Weaknesses in internal compliance systems and ethical standards, highlighted by regulatory scrutiny and insider trading probe

queries.rationale: Investigate compliance with financial regulations and any legal issues
Explore any reports of unethical workplace practices or social issues
Examine past and ongoing legal disputes involving the firm
